1.0.name: wordpress/shopp-seo-glue
1.0.description:
This plugin helps WordPress SEO and Shopp to work together - you can even assign titles and descriptions to virtual pages such as the cart, checkout and account pages. The current version of Shopp SEO Glue was built against:

  • WordPress 3.5
  • Shopp 1.2.5
  • WordPress SEO 1.3.2

No other configurations have been tested and this plugin will not work (and anyway should not be required) if you are using the old 1.1 branch of Shopp.

This plugin was written by Barry Hughes ... if you want to support this plugin or are in need of some positive karma then feel free to buy Barry a beer - contributions also by Lars Koudal.
